excerpt: "Nov 14 (Reuters) - Airbnb (ABNB.O) said on Tuesday it has acquired GamePlanner.AI, a 12-person startup, for an undisclosed sum, amid rapid adoption of artificial intelligence that has taken the tech world by storm and pushed many companies to explore its uses."
